items.content_html: The Employee Management System is a web app for task management in small teams. Managers can assign tasks, and employees can mark them as completed. Built with HTML, TailwindCSS, and React.js, it uses LocalStorage to manage data locally, providing a lightweight and efficient solution.
items.title: Mayurpatel07/EMS: The Employee Management System is a web app for task management in small teams. Managers can assign tasks, and employees can mark them as completed. Built with HTML, TailwindCSS, and React.js, it uses LocalStorage to manage data locally, providing a lightweight and efficient solution.

items.content_html: Bundlify is a lightweight JavaScript bundler built from scratch, designed for educational purposes. It supports static and dynamic imports, code splitting. Inspired by modern tools like Webpack and Vite, Bundlify simplifies the bundling process while providing essential features like CSS and image handling, tree shaking, and minification.
items.title: Shaban-Eissa/Bundlify: Bundlify is a lightweight JavaScript bundler built from scratch, designed for educational purposes. It supports static and dynamic imports, code splitting. Inspired by modern tools like Webpack and Vite, Bundlify simplifies the bundling process while providing essential features like CSS and image handling, tree shaking, and minification.

items.content_html: Market Depth Generator is a lightweight library for simulating market depth, trade data, and OHLC candlesticks. Designed for trading platforms and financial applications, it generates realistic trading data with customizable configurations.
